channel.title: Duchess slap change
channel.description:
Used it. Apparently, doesn't force a rescind, only further accusation. Not only that, but immediately led to my execution.
Hows about making it actually stealthy? Make it so that as soon as a majority would be reached on a player they are accusing, they are forced to rescind without knowing or something.
